body_html:
Is it TLB misses or page faults? Page cache should cause page faults.
What process does trigger the faults?
You can check it with perf record -a -g -e faults, then ctrl+C after 10 seconds, then perf report.
Does the tf program read any files? Is it possible that some other process constantly reads something from the disk?
body_text:
Is it TLB misses or page faults? Page cache should cause page faults.
What process does trigger the faults?
You can check it with perf record -a -g -e faults, then ctrl+C after 10 seconds, then perf report.
Does the tf program read any files? Is it possible that some other process constantly reads something from the disk?
body:
Is it TLB misses or page faults? Page cache should cause page faults.
What process does trigger the faults?
You can check it with `perf record -a -g -e faults`, then ctrl+C after 10 seconds, then `perf report`.
Does the tf program read any files? Is it possible that some other process constantly reads something from the disk?
